page.statement:
To complete this module you need to pass the following assessment; the passmark is 100%.

We recommend you read the questions carefully before answering. Once you have moved on you cannot return to previous questions.

question.text: Which of the following statements is true regarding broken, worn or poorly designed equipment?
question.ans: It is unlikely to result in physical contamination
It does not need to be replaced

question.text: Which of the following is an essential property of food equipment?
question.ans: Capable of being stored above floor level
Strong enough to carry the weight of one person

question.text: What should you do with food equipment that is cracked, chipped, damaged or defective?
question.ans: Use it only until replacement equipment arrives
Don't use it and advise your supervisor

question.text: Which of the following is required by law?
question.ans: Isolation rooms for food handlers with food poisoning
